subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Gov. Edward G. Rendell of Pennsylvania will be rooting hard for the Eagles and the Steelers. But if both of them win and advance to the Super Bowl, he will not pretend to be neutral.
snippet: Gov. Edward G. Rendell of Pennsylvania will be rooting hard for the Eagles and the Steelers. But if both of them win and advance to the Super Bowl, he will not pretend to be neutral.
